Endometriosis: Tauranga woman welcomes Pharmac’s decision to fund Cerazette https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-ply-times/news/news/endomutiosis-tauranga-woman-worma-wormacs-warmacs-decision-decision-to-fund-cerazette/pxdxde32tfbtfbtvdxxqgkrd3tyg4m/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-ply-times/news/news/endomutiosis-tauranga-woman-worma-wormacs-warmacs-decision-decision-to-fund-cerazette/pxdxde32tfbtfbtvdxxqgkrd3tyg4m/ Megan Wilson'This will really help, especially young women who are learning to manage the disease.' Sun, 16 Mar 2025 16:02:00 +0000 Tauranga woman Kaydi O’Connor was diagnosed with endometriosis in December 2024. She has welcomed Pharmac's decision to fund the contraceptive pill Cerazette from April 1, which she had already been taking to alleviate her symptoms. Photo / Supplied
